entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Near blizzard and snow beginning this afternoon. Blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
